solution_line_template: 2 students per computer means the total number of computers is {initial_students} / {students_per_computer} = <<{initial_students}/{students_per_computer}={initial_computers}>>{initial_computers} computers.

with the arrival of {additional_students} students, the number of computers that should be added is {additional_students} / {students_per_computer} = <<{additional_students}/{students_per_computer}={additional_computers}>>{additional_computers} computers.
